name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share messages with newcomers in Google Meet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to easily generate chat history for the ones who just logged in into the room.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When somebody new logs into Google Meet then you can share the chat history with one click
